org.lwjgl.opencl

Interface CLSVMFreeCallback

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CLSVMFreeCallback.Buf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLSVMFreeCallback.BufAdapter

    public interface CLSVMFreeCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the EnqueueSVMFree method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  CLSVMFreeCallback.Buf
      Extends CLSVMFreeCallback with an alternative version that accepts a buffer.
      static class  CLSVMFreeCallback.BufAdapter
      A CLSVMFreeCallback.Buf adapter.
      static class  CLSVMFreeCallback.Util 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(long queue, int num_svm_pointers, long svm_pointers)
      The CL20.clEnqueueSVMFree(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) callback.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(long queue,
          int num_svm_pointers,
          long svm_pointers)
        The CL20.clEnqueueSVMFree(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) callback.
        Parameters:
        queue - the opaque pointer of the command queue in which CL20.clEnqueueSVMFree(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) was enqueued
        num_svm_pointers - the count of SVM pointers to free
        svm_pointers - the list of SVM pointers to free
